commit message: Allowed buttons labels to point to a string resource, thanks to matthias.glaub
Removed labels for special buttons as they're not read but retrieved from string resources
Fixed orientation issue #53 thanks to matthias.glaub
[issue #54] First effort to deal with multiple tracks
[issue #54] Track manager enhancements, added ability to delete track. Added some multi-track awareness to other activity (waypoints list)
[issue #54] Added support for exporting tracks + propagated current track id on every activity/code to deal with multiple tracks.
[issue #54] Added proper GPX export using AsyncTask and a nice progress bar. Minor UI tweaks.
[issue #54] First draft of managing the 'active' status of a track

[issue #54] Integrated patch from jdmonin to deal with active track.
Preparing release v0.5.0

Added multitrack ability, with help of jdmonin
Minor bugfixes with help of matthias.glaub
